module.description_full: Secure online payments for your business. Take advantage of a modern, flexible, and optimized payment solution- all with one contract, one integration and free setup.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess credit cards, 20+ local payment methods and support for over 80 banksTake advantage of the Skrill multi-currency account, giving you access to 40+ currenciesHigh-security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktopConnect with millions of Skrill account holders

module.name: paypal
module.description: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This free official PayPal module can help you grow your sales by adding PayPal and PayPal Pay Later options to your store. With millions of users in over 200 markets, PayPal is one of the most trusted and familiar brands in the world.
module.additional_description: Activate easilyWith PayPal, you can start accepting payments quickly without any set-up fee. Include Pay Later options at no extra cost to your businessPay Later lets customers pay over time while you get paid upfront. [1] PayPal's pay later options are helping boost merchant conversion rates and cart sizes by 39% [2] Promote Pay Later on your siteLet customers know they have the flexibility to buy now and pay later by adding Pay Later promotional messaging and Pay Later button to your site. Offer fast checkout with less frictionStreamlined checkout helps reduce cart abandonment, drive conversion rates, and encourage repeat business. With PayPal, customers can use their saved billing and shipping info to check out faster — on any device. Get best-in-class fraud detectionPayPal helps you handle the risk of fraudulent transactions with our fraud, chargeback, and Seller Protection [3] capabilities (on eligible transactions). Our AI technology works hard to monitor your transactions – so you can focus on what matters most. Access funds quickly. After a customer completes their PayPal transaction, you’re quickly credited while the payment is processing. Funds settle directly into your PayPal business account. PayPal is one of the world’s most trusted, and familiar brands [4]Millions of global users20+ years of experience200+ markets around the world100+ different currencies  [1] PayPal Pay Later eligibility and availability is subject to merchant status, sector and integration. Consumer eligibility is subject to status and approval. Product features differ by market. See relevant product terms for more details.https://www.paypal.com/uk/webapps/mpp/paypal-payin3/terms[2] PayPal Q2 earnings 2021.[3] Available on eligible purchases. Limits apply. https://www.paypal.com/us/webapps/mpp/ua/useragreement-full[4] Morning Consult - The 15 Most Trusted Brands Globally. March 2021.

module.name: payplug
module.displayName: - Payplug - Accept customer payments, wherever they are
module.description: Cash all customer credit card payments with a single payment solution: on your PrestaShop e-commerce site, in-store, or directly from online customer conversations
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Cash all customer credit card payments with a single payment solution: on your PrestaShop e-commerce site, in-store, or directly from online customer conversations.
module.additional_description: One payment system for all your sales channels Payplug allows credit card payments:via your online store (PrestaShop) in just a few clicks;in-store, with payment terminals that meet the highest market standards;through payment links from customer conversations via text, e-mail, messenger, or WhatsApp.Then you can manage all payments from one tool, your Payplug portal. Manage your performance directly from the Payplug portalView all payments in real time;Understand why credit card payments failed;Download integrated accounting reports in one simple click;Generate payment links to be shared via online customer conversations;Carry out bank transfer requests and receive them within 24 hours! Establish your own PrestaShop module to receive online paymentsInstall the Payplug payment module in just a few clicks. Choose the display type for your payment page (redirected, pop-up), and customize the background of your payment page (including colors). Our online payment module is fully secure and compatible with PSD2 - no extra handling is required from you. Handle Payplug directly from your PrestaShop backoffice: for example, you can organize customer refunds. Increase your turnover with PayLaterOffer your customers the option to pay in 3 or 4 installments with or without fees and receive full payment for the order immediately. Fraud and non-payment are 100% covered by our partner Oney.Merchants offering this Payplug feature to their customers have seen their average shopping cart value increase by 45% on average.New: with Payplug, choose the minimum and maximum shopping cart amounts between which the 3x or 4x payment option is made available to your customers. One more step towards optimising your margin! French-speaking supportOnce your payment module is set up, contact our Paris-based support teams with your questions about your online PrestaShop payments.

This module came with one month Mini Plan license, that allowing you 1500 queries/month. After the purchase, please contact FraudLabs Pro to unlock the license.

module.name: paybox
module.description: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Up2pay e-Transactions[1] is a ecommerce payment solution in a secure interface from Crédit Agricole. You can easily install the solution on your PrestaShop online store to offer your customers a personalized shopping experience
module.additional_description: For several years, Crédit Agricole has been supporting thousands of French e-retailers with the Up2pay e-Transactions solution that meets their needs and those of their customers.With Up2pay e-transactions, you benefit from all the advantages of a well-known french bank:- One of the most attractive electronic banking commission rates on the market from the start of your activity- Payment of cash receipts into your account on D+1- A single contact person to meet your needs- After-sales support included (email and telephone) based in France Discover our commitment-free offer here. New : Up2pay e-Transactions Prestashop module is 3D Secure V2 compliant, in accordance with DSP2 regulation.[1] Up2pay e-Transactions is an offer subject to general and pricing conditions, reserved for professionals registered in France, excluding Marketplaces. The Up2pay e-Transactions offer requires a Crédit Agricole account agreement and the signature of an e-commerce card payment acceptance contract including the Up2pay e-Transactions services option.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Customers who read reviews are 3x more likely to convert than others. We offer a turnkey solution for collecting, managing, analyzing and publishing customer reviews.
module.additional_description: We offer a solution that will give you a 360 degree "voice of the customer" strategy which includes: multichannel collection, monitoring and moderation platform, statistics engine & verbatim analysis, syndication of opinions, and retrieval of opinions from third-party sources. 1. A quick and easy all-in-one solution. 2. From site reviews, product reviews, and business reviews everything in our soultion can be adapted to your needs including personalized opinion email requests, campaign deadlines, and how the widgets are displayed. 3. Google Partner - display stars in your search and PLA google ads campaigns thanks to our partnership with Google. 4. A trusted third party - Our feedback requests are make after the purchase on 100% of your buyers. 5. By turning customer opinions into a KPI, you are engaging with your teams in a positive way, engaging in better communication and optimizing your entire business. 6. Take advantage of the interconnection between our opinion platform and other Skeepers products and put your customer at the heart of your marketing strategy.

module.name: magnalister
module.description: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Connect your Prestashop easily with marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or Cdiscount.Upload products, import orders or synchronize stock and prices automatically.
module.additional_description: Sell more than ever :78% of all online-buyer-decisions are made on marketplaces like eBay, Amazon, Rakuten, PriceMinister or CdiscountThese are the most important distribution channels to increase your sales dramatically. Use your Prestashop in combination with the magnalister addon and make your store a distribution, inventory- and order-management-system. ​magnalister is the ultimate connection between PrestaShop and eBay, Amazon & Co.  4 main processes supports your daily work:- Upload products directly from PrestaShop to the marketplaces- Orders are imported automatically from the marketplaces into PrestaShop- Automatic stock and price synchronization- Automatic transmission of status like "shipped" or "paid" Many additional features like variation-transmission or usage of different price groups makes selling more easy. Free 30-day trial! : Immediately after the notification and shop-registration, you will receive your personal unique activation key (pass phrase). With this key you can activate and use the software to it's full extent. No additional or further costs are incurred during the 30 days test period. After the free trial, magnalister costs starting from 29 EUR excl. tax.

module.name: ndksteppingpack
module.description: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step"
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Sell products from your catalog, by including them in packs composing "step by step". This module will allow you to create product packs to compose your customers among selections in your catalog.
module.additional_description: Increase sales of targeted products in your catalog. Increase the value of the basket of your visitors by influencing on sets of products. Guide your customers in the selection of your products. With this module you create as many steps as you want, each with an arbitrary selection of products. For each step you set a minimum rule adding to cart. Once validated rule, your customer can go to the next step. Once all the steps validated, your customer can finalize the order and receive the discount you have set in your pack! New: fix a price for your pack, the system automatically created a product pack and synchronize your stocks.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp
module.author: Smartsupp
module.description_full: Drive your online sales through conversations, and automate sales with Smartsupp. We offer everything you need to grow your online sales: AI, LeadGen chatbots, live chat, and much more you can use to engage your visitors at the right time.
module.additional_description: Jumpstart your sales and boost conversions with Smartsupp. Our packages offer everything you need: AI, LeadGen chatbots, and live chat to help you turn visitors into customers. Automate responses to repetitive questions and provide a personal touch when it matters the most. Gain insights into your customer service with accurate statistics – track customer satisfaction, agents' performance efficiency, and more. If you want to use one of the world's most trusted live chat and chatbot apps, use Smartsupp. We currently power up over 100,000 webshops and websites so they can better:Chat with customers and build powerful relationships. Our easy-to-install, fast chat box is complemented by Messenger, and email, so every conversation is accessible via our mobile apps.Convert visitors into customers by running powerful lead gen campaigns with automated messages and chatbots.Engage both customers and visitors with our AI-powered sales and care assistants who are always available and ready to help.Understand the conversation flow, how happy your customers are with your team and offering, and what they ask about – but also who converts and who requires your attention. What our users say about us? "Smartsupp helps us to make our online shop even more successful! After a simple installation, we immediately had the first customer with a question, who then ordered straight away."—Oke Harms, Kickerkult.de "With Smartsupp we use one chat in several shops! Thanks to them, we have been able to improve our contact with customers. Communication is instant and convenient for both us and the customers."—Katarzyna, Wujo.pl “70 % of our orders comes through live chat”-Irena ŽIROVNICKÁ, Customer care team leader Unuo Design

badge.label: Customer satisfaction: Partner of the year

module.name: amazonpay
module.description: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creati
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Amazon Pay offers a familiar, safe, and secure way for hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers globally to complete purchases in your store using their Amazon account - avoiding account creation, re-entering credit card information, and typing their billing and shipping addresses. The performance is continually optimized by Amazon’s technology, learnings, and best practices. What's New with Amazon Pay? When shoppers check out with Amazon Pay and Affirm, they get more flexibility than ever (US only).
module.additional_description: Reduce friction at checkout: Shoppers complete purchases in as few as three clicks. Amazon automatically recognizes when shoppers have an active Amazon login, so they don’t need to sign in again.Enhance brand trust: The Amazon brand is a proven winner of customer trust, and that trust halo extends to Amazon [1]. Furthermore, the Amazon Pay A-to-Z Guarantee helps raise customer confidence with buying online.Delivery Notifications: Proactively alert customers on the arrival status of physical goods orders via Amazon Alexa [1]Rest assured with advanced fraud protection: An active base of online shoppers also helps reduce decline handling and fraud risk.Make it easier for international shoppers to buy: Multi-currency support reduces friction in the checkout process by maintaining the local currency experience across the shopping journey and helps customers avoid currency conversion fees from their credit card issuer or bank.Easily and flexibly integrate Amazon Pay into your store: Built-in support for strong customer authentication as required under Payment Services Directive (PSD2). With 91% of Amazon Pay customers saying they would use Amazon Pay again and hundreds of millions of active Amazon customers already enabled for Amazon Pay, it can help you increase sales [2]. [1]: For two years in a row, The Values Institute ranked Amazon as the top most trusted brand in retail in 2018. Also, in brand rankings from BrandZ by Kantar MillwardBrown and Best Global Brand 2019 by Interbrand, Amazon is rated as the top most valuable brand. [2]:Consumer Net Promoter Score (NPS) Surveys: Conducted by Amazon Pay in 2019 among US, UK, DE, FR, IT, and ES consumers who had used Amazon Pay in the 12 months preceding to the survey launch dates

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: The Stripe Connector for PrestaShop offers a global, scalable integration for payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Stripe Connector for PrestaShop offers a global, scalable integration for payments. Install the connector on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account or connect your existing one, and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Boost revenue by modernising your checkout. Drive conversion with Link, a one-click checkout experience your customers can complete in just 6 seconds—that’s 9x faster than non-Link customers. Continuously optimise checkout with built-in conversion logic that reduces user friction and adjusts across devices.  Satisfy customer preferences and increase conversion with local payment methods like SEPA Direct Debit, iDEAL, Bancontact, P24, EPS, Giropay, FPX, popular wallets such as Apple Pay and Google Pay, and buy now, pay later methods. Simply turn on over 40 payment methods with no additional development required and dynamically display the most relevant payment methods based on your customers’ location and device. It’s a reliable and secure platform trusted by millions of ecommerce businesses around the world that protects your customers from data breaches, fraud, and security threats. Stay compliant with PSD2 SCA requirements in Europe with no additional development work.

Understand what works so you can amplify your effortsWith a connected store, you bring your ecommerce and marketing data into one centralized place. This allows you the ability to understand the ROI of your marketing efforts so you can best optimize your marketing strategy.

module.name: klarnapayment
module.description: Klarna Payments official module will offer your customers the choice to pay in parts, pay later, pay now, pay with Sofort or pay in instalments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Payments official module will offer your customers the choice to pay in parts, pay later, pay now, pay with Sofort or pay in instalments. Increase your sales and your conversion with Klarna! That's smoooth!
module.additional_description: Integrating Klarna on your PrestaShop offers benefits such as increased conversion rates, improved customer experience, risk management, access to Klarna's customer base, marketing opportunities, data analytics, simplified operations, and a competitive advantage in the market. - Increased Conversion Rates Klarna's payment options, such as Pay Later and Pay in 3, can help boost your conversion rates. By providing customers with flexible payment options, you can reduce cart abandonment rates and encourage more customers to complete their purchases. - Improved Customer Experience Klarna's seamless integration with PrestaShop enhances the overall customer experience. The streamlined checkout process, simplified returns, and user-friendly interface contribute to higher customer satisfaction, resulting in increased customer loyalty and repeat purchases. - Risk Management Klarna assumes the risk of non-payment for purchases made through their platform. This means that you are protected against the financial risks associated with fraud, chargebacks, and customer defaults. Klarna takes on the responsibility of ensuring payment, reducing the burden on your side. - Access to Klarna's Customer Base Integrating Klarna opens up opportunities for you to tap into Klarna's extensive customer base. Klarna has a network of 150M users in the world, and by offering Klarna as a payment option on PrestaShop, you can attract new customers who prefer the convenience and flexibility provided by Klarna. - Marketing and Promotion Klarna offers marketing and promotional benefits to its merchant partners. By integrating with Klarna, you can leverage Klarna's marketing campaigns, co-marketing initiatives, and promotional offers to increase their visibility, attract more customers, and drive sales. - Data Analytics and Insights Klarna provides you valuable data analytics and insights. You gain access to detailed information about customer behavior, purchasing patterns, and preferences. This data can be used to optimize product offerings, pricing strategies, and marketing campaigns, leading to more informed business decisions. - Simplified Operations Klarna's integration with PrestaShop simplifies and automates payment processing and reconciliation. You can easily manage transactions, refunds, and returns directly in your PrestaShop store back-end. - Competitive Advantage By offering Klarna as a payment option, you can gain a competitive edge in the market. Klarna is a well-known and trusted payment solution, and its integration on PrestaShop can attract customers who prefer the convenience and security it provides, potentially leading to increased sales and market share. - Global products, local faces All products are built to be adapted to local preferences and legislations. Last but not least, Klarna provides local support for you and your customers.

module.name: ps_checkout
module.description: Make shopping on your online store easier with our PrestaShop Checkout built with PayPal
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Make shopping on your online store easier with our PrestaShop Checkout built with PayPal. Accept payments from customers around the world and improve your conversion rate with smoother online payments.
module.additional_description: Easy to use Easy-to-use, all-in-one PrestaShop payment module. Transaction management and history via a single interface Refund management (partial and total) Easy accounting reconciliation. Optimal conversion Instantly accept payments by credit card, PayPal, or other locally used payment methods. With Express Checkout, integrate a quick buy button on the product or order pages. By allowing customers to order in half the number of clicks, it can boost conversion by up to 80%. International development Accept up to 20 different currencies and sell without borders in over 190 countries. Secure payments PayPal protects every transaction to preserve your customers' payment information and prevent fraud on your site. Thanks to the 3D Secure system, the payments on your store are protected against all types of fraud. Discover our preferential and transparent rates No setup fees No monthly fee Commission per payment method. Prestashop Checkout offers you very competitive transaction rates. Refer to our price list for more details about your country's conditions. We can offer a custom price for businesses exceeding €50k in monthly revenue. Contact PayPal for more information.

module.author: Silbersaiten

Optionally, you can also store your bank data in the module configuration and transfer them to Business Portal.

module.name: bluepayment
module.description: Autopay S.A. BluePayment plugin enables quick and secure acceptance of online payments by e-sellers using PrestaShop software
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Autopay S.A. BluePayment plugin enables quick and secure acceptance of online payments by e-sellers using PrestaShop software.
module.additional_description: Autopay S.A. BluePayment plugin enables quick and secure acceptance of online payments by e-sellers using PrestaShop software. Install the plugin, provide your clients with their favourite payment channels and develop your online sales. How do you benefit from installing the BluePayment plugin? Thanks to easy and straightforward integration with our Autopay payment gateway, you obtain the possibility of accepting online payments from the clients of your online store. The installation and configuration process is very simple. In only a few minutes time you can give your clients the possibility of paying for their purchases via their favorite channels. The funds paid by them will be credited directly to your account on a day + 1 basis. What will your clients gain? First of all, the possibility of safe and convenient online shopping. Autopay payment gateway allows you to use the most popular payment methods, including fast Pay by Link, BLIK 0, card payment or payment by instalments. The key advantage is 100% payment security, which we can guarantee as a national payment institution providing modern payment solutions based on stable and proven technology used by banks and a number of other institutions.

module.name: klaviyops
module.description: Klaviyo, a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more, gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions—so you can build long-term customer relationships at scal
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klaviyo, a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more, gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions—so you can build long-term customer relationships at scale, and grow your business on your own terms.
module.additional_description: Automations to help you make money while you sleep.Dozens of built-in automations are fully customizable, like welcome emails, happy birthday, or abandon cart. Each can have any mix of emails and texts. So while you’re dreaming up your next big idea, customers are automatically getting timely, actionable info. Smarter targeting. Deeper personalization. Bigger payoff.Drive more sales with powerful personalization. Whether you’re sending a drip campaign, a transactional email, or a special holiday campaign, ultra-relevant content can help you boost engagement—and earn more revenue. Get more answers out of your data.Data is powerful—but only if you can find it, understand it, and act on it. With Klaviyo, performance is clear. Pre-built reports answer the marketing questions that matter most. Go beyond vanity metrics and understand what’s driving sales. (Really.) Sync all your store data with a single clickOur seamless one-click ecommerce integration allows you to sync all your historical and real-time data, so you can stay on top of every single interaction people have with your brand. Grow your contact list with engaging web forms.Select from expertly designed form templates, and create engaging website forms that turn site visitors into subscribers with our simple Form Builder.

module.name: izettleconnector
module.description: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps.
module.additional_description: Create an Zettle product library in secondsThis module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the Zettle product library in 3 easy steps. It synchronizes your product stock quantity and product prices continuously. So your product stock is kept up to date no matter if you are selling a product via Zettle on the point of sale or in your online shop. Easy product exportYou can either export your complete PrestaShop product library to Zettle or choose a specific category. Also, you can export single products to Zettle. During the export configuration you can choose if price and stock quantity are part of the export or if you just want to export the products to create the Zettle product library. Automatic synchronizationEverytime an item is sold in your store or online, the product data gets synchronized between PrestaShop and Zettle. The module is providing full control how the synchronization is performed. Automatically, manually or by setting up a cronjob.If you are using the manual sync, you will get a full overview of the product data changes before you perform the update. If an error occurs during synchronization, you will receive a push email notification. Import Zettle orders to PrestaShopOrders that have been completed on Zettle will be imported to PrestaShop automatically. This module enables you to have all orders in one place. Synchronization historyYou can review all completed product export and product synchronization events. SecurityThe communication between Zettle and PrestaShop is based on the Zettle API. Any critical credentials are encrypted using the latest industry standard.  The services include: Zettle, a member of the PayPal family, is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants – enabling people like you to accept in-person cash, cards, contactless and mobile payments. It also helps you to easily organise your products, track stock levels and monitor sales. The Zettle Reader:The Zettle reader 2 is super-fast and processes in-person contactless payments from credit cards, debit cards and American Express, as well as payments via Apple, Samsung and Google Pay. The Zettle Go app:The point-of-sale for any business. Seamlessly integrated with the Zettle Reader, it let’s you run your business – on the go or over the counter. Your shopfront and back office – all in one easy-to-use system.

module.name: ps_eventbus
module.description: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features&q
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: PS EventBus is a companion module that is automatically deployed as a dependency when specific modules are installed on your PrestaShop store (see the list of modules concerned in the "Features" tab). The PS EventBus module enables the synchronisation of technical and non-personal data between your shop and these other modules installed on your shop. This synchronisation is necessary for the good operation of the modules concerned. Uninstalling the PS EventBus module may cause these modules to crash or even stop working completely.

It's a one-step, mobile-optimized checkout form that increases conversion rates by up to 50%.Give your shoppers the flexibility to pay the way they want (Cards, ApplePay, GooglePay, Klarna) without the need to integrate each payment method - just install Simpler Checkout and boost your sales instantly! Simpler & faster checkout: Simpler Checkout for first-timers is at least 50% faster than the native checkout, which results in higher conversions.Checkout with 1 click for repeat customers: Returning shoppers checkout in as little as 6 seconds! This strengthens loyalty with a delightful returning shopper experience.Optimised for mobile: A simply designed form that fits the shopper's screen and results in a 20-50% increase in conversion rates.Offers all popular payment methods: Simpler Checkout offers a complete list of all popular payment methods: Credit/Debit Cards, Digital Wallets like ApplePay & GooglePay, Klarna etc.Reduce the steps to checkout: With Simpler, the buying funnel starts with the product page, followed by the mini cart page, then the cart page, and, finally, the checkout page. Shoppers prefer the option to buy earlier in the funnel. So, rather than making the purchase after reaching the checkout page, 78% of shoppers would choose to checkout earlier in the buying journey: 21% for the product page, 32% for mini cart, and 25% for cart.+50% registered shoppers: Simpler "kills" guest checkout, as every Simpler shopper is a registered customer. Simpler gives you access to significant amounts of first-party data that can be used for targeting & personalised offers, and can also provide marketers with detailed insight into your customer's.

Here are some of these potential benefits:Customer base expansion: By accepting payments in SEPA and cryptocurrencies, merchants can attract customers who prefer to use digital currencies to make online purchases. This can help expand the potential customer base and increase sales.Reduced transaction fees: Cryptocurrency payments typically involve lower transaction fees than traditional credit card or bank transfer payments. Merchants can therefore save money on transaction fees and increase their profit margin.Increased security: Cryptocurrency payments are encrypted and anonymous, which can help reduce the risks of fraud and theft of personal information. In addition, cryptocurrency transactions are irreversible, making it difficult for customers to dispute transactions after they have been made.Easier international transactions: Cryptocurrency payments are not subject to foreign exchange restrictions or conversion fees, making international transactions easier for both merchants and customers.Innovative image: Integrating cryptocurrency payment solutions can give merchants an innovative and forward-thinking image, which can help improve their reputation and positioning in the market.Commissions: The merchant has the possibility to set the coefficient of his commissions between 1% and 5%

You work hard on your website, but sometimes non-constructive customers leave aggressive reviews for no reasonable reason. Smartarget Reviews allows you to have full control on the reviews you show on your website.

module.name: smartargetpopupforms
module.description: Popup forms on PrestaShop capture emails with attention-grabbing incentives, timed triggers, growing your mailing list effectively
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Popup forms on PrestaShop capture emails with attention-grabbing incentives, timed triggers, growing your mailing list effectively
module.additional_description: You spend a lot of time and money to bring customers to your website, you better want to have their email in order to make sure they will get your newsletter in the future. Using Popup Forms by Smartarget will help you to collect emails of customers by showing a popup when they visit your website. Newsletters could be a powerful marketing tool to bring back customers or to make potential customers buy your product and service for the first time. With Newsletter you can offer incentives for users, tell them about new products or services, etc. But the first step is to get their email so they become a lead. With Popup Forms by Smartarget you can design your own popup very quickly and start collecting emails. It’s that simple for you to start growing your mailing list. As much as more users visit your website, you can be sure that your mailing list will grow by using our app. You don’t need to have any coding skills or help from developers to configure your Popup Forms and show it on your website. It takes only a few minutes to create the popup of your dreams.

module.name: btecommercecopilot
module.displayName: E-commerce Copilot - Generate & Translate with chatGPT4
module.description: Save time with your E-commerce Copilot. Use GPT-4 artificial intelligence to assist you in the creation and translation of product descriptions, categories and CMS pages
module.author: Business Tech
module.description_full: Save time with your E-commerce Copilot. Use GPT-4 artificial intelligence to assist you in the creation and translation of product descriptions, categories and CMS pages. Keep control over AI-generated content.
module.additional_description: The daily task of writing product descriptions can be tedious and time-consuming. And we know that your time is precious. That's why we're providing you with an e-commerce co-pilot that will help you create the best possible, SEO-optimized descriptions in the shortest possible time. Our "E-commerce Copilot" module lets you use the power of GPT-4 artificial intelligence to generate your product and category descriptions, as well as the content of your CMS pages. Don't spend hours manually writing your product descriptions: team up with a qualified partner and save time every day! SAVE TIME EVERY DAY The module installs an e-commerce content writing wizard on your PrestaShop store, saving you time every day: choose the type of content you want to write (short, long or meta description of a product or category, CMS page content), ask the AI to generate it, proofread it, modify it if necessary, then save! In just a few clicks, you'll have a complete, SEO-optimized text with minimum effort. In the same way, you can ask GPT-4 to translate content into any of your store's languages.We've already drawn up prompts for you to send to GPT-4, so that you can start using the module as soon as it's installed, and save time in the process. However, if for any reason you'd like to write your own prompts, you can! A tab in the module configuration is dedicated to customizing prompts.Finally, there's no need to go outside the product creation forms to use AI: we've integrated the tool for generating and translating product descriptions directly within the forms. This allows you to enlist the help of your co-pilot directly during the product creation process! You can also call on your e-commerce assistant at any time, wherever you are in the back office of your PrestaShop store. The AI can be accessed directly via a menu section in your PrestaShop store. KEEP CONTROL OVER THE QUALITY OF YOUR CONTENT Artificial Intelligence is powerful, but it can't completely replace you. That's why we've made it a point of honor to let you control the content generated, ensuring that the text is consistent and perfectly reflects your vision and the style of your store. Once your approval has been obtained, the module automatically saves the new texts or translations.

module.name: smartargetsocialproofsales
module.description: Show notifications of previous sales on your website to get more trust by new and existing customers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Show notifications of previous sales on your website to get more trust by new and existing customers. Using Social Proof Sales by Smartarget will show random notifications of products that you pick only.
module.additional_description: Create a pool of names and a pool of items you want to promote and the Social Proof Sales app will show it on your website. This app can help your users to gain more trust and for you to have more sales! Pick the right user experience you want You can choose what items to promote, add relevant pictures and customers names. Pick the position of the notification, how many notifications to show and the frequency. It doesn't matter if your website is new or already running for many years, with Social Proof Sales you can manually add notifications and make your new customers aware of previous sales.

module.name: addonvalidatecustomer
module.description: This Prestashop Validate Users at Registration Module allows admins to validates new user registrations and also offers various features for admin approval, email notifications, and auto-assigning cus
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This Prestashop Validate Users at Registration Module allows admins to validates new user registrations and also offers various features for admin approval, email notifications, and auto-assigning customer groups.
module.additional_description: PrestaShop Validate New Users at Registration Module offers many important features that can help you get your eCommerce game to next level. Enhanced Security: By requiring admin approval for new user registrations, the module helps prevent fraudulent or unauthorized accounts from accessing the website. This added layer of security can protect the merchant from potential scams or malicious activities. Quality Control: Admin approval ensures that only legitimate users gain access to the online store. This can help maintain a higher standard of quality among the customer base, reducing the likelihood of fake or spam accounts. Customized User Group Assignment: The ability to auto-assign user groups allows merchants to segment their customer base effectively. Different user groups can be associated with specific pricing, discounts, or access privileges. This customization can lead to targeted marketing efforts and improved customer experiences. Communication Efficiency: Email notifications for account approval and pending requests keep users informed about the status of their registrations. This proactive communication helps build trust and engagement with customers. Reduced Workload: Automation of user group assignment and email notifications streamlines administrative tasks. This frees up admin resources to focus on other critical aspects of managing the online store, such as product management, customer support, and marketing. Targeted Marketing: User groups enable merchants to tailor marketing campaigns and promotions to specific segments of their customer base. This targeted approach can lead to higher conversion rates and increased sales. Validate Users at Registration Module provides merchants with tools to enhance security, streamline administrative tasks, improve communication, and optimize customer management. These benefits collectively contribute to a more efficient and profitable online store operation.

module.name: aireviewgenerator
module.description: Automatically Generate Human Like Reviews on your Products with our highly advance AI Review Generator Module
module.author: FME Modules
module.description_full: Automatically Generate Human Like Reviews on your Products with our highly advance AI Review Generator Module. With AI Review Generator, you can now generate authentic, persuasive, and engaging reviews that resonate with your target audience.
module.additional_description: Welcome to the future of e-commerce product reviews! Our PrestaShop AI Review Generator module has been designed to transform how you manage and showcase product reviews on your online store. Powered by AI technology, AI Review Generator not only automates the review generation process but also offers an array of customizable features to boost credibility, engage customers, and drive sales. Automated Review Generation:Prestashop AI Review Generator module integrates ChatGPT to craft compelling product reviews automatically. Because of ChatGPT advance natural language processing model all reviews generated by our module are indistinguishable from those written by real customers. Gone are the days of struggling to collect genuine reviews. AI Review Generator eliminates the need for manual review creation, saving you time and effort. Precise Review Placement:AI Review Generator allows you to select the products where you want your review to appear. You can select a single product or can also choose whole categories. Rules Based Architecture:AI Review Generator Module has an advanced rules based approach to its implementation. This allows you to create each rule with different criteria's for your review generation. You can select a rule with one single product in it and another rule with a one and more categories. Strategic Scheduling:Timing is everything. AI Review Generator gives you the ability to schedule your review generator process. Plan your reviews strategically by specifying the start and end dates for review generation. Align reviews with product launches, promotions, or seasonal campaigns effortlessly. Star Rating Included:Prestashop AI Review Generator Module also offers start rating feature. Our module allows you to effortlessly create product reviews while giving you complete control over the star ratings associated with each review. With the ability to set lower and upper limits for the rating our module auto assigns stars to each review. Customize the Quantity: Our module gives you the option to select the total number of reviews to be generated for a rule. Tailor the volume of reviews to your exact needs. Whether you need a handful to kickstart a new product's online presence or hundreds to establish credibility for a bestseller, you can specify the number of reviews you want to generate. No Seperate ChatGPT Subscription:At no extra cost, enjoy the full capabilities of our AI Review Generator Module, including ChatGPT integration. With our product, you don't need a separate subscription for ChatGPT. Multi-Language Support: Prestashop AI Review Generator Module is allows you to generate reviews in multiple languages. This enables you to generate reviews in your target markets. Whether you're expanding internationally or catering to a diverse customer base, our module ensures your product reviews are relatable and effective.

module.name: smartargetcountdownpopup

module.additional_description: Using countdown popups on your website provides a compelling edge. By instilling a sense of urgency, countdown popups enhance visitor engagement and amplify conversion rates. Whether used for time-limited offers, product debuts, etc. You can use the Countdown Popup to promote a special discount, announce upcoming new items, push more sales for holidays, etc. These popups seize attention, spurring immediate action. Effortlessly integrated into your website, countdown popups elevate user experience and cultivate an elevated conversion rate, establishing them as a valuable instrument for potent marketing and time-critical promotions.

module.name: xyconnectcegid

module.author: WebXY
module.description_full: Connector Cegid Retail XY-Connect synchronizes your Cegid Retail platform with PrestShop(omnichannel strategy). Automatic synchronization of products, combinations, stocks, prices, categories, establishments, customers, orders and order statuses.
module.additional_description: With the Connector Cegid Retail XY-Connect module, you gain in productivity, consistency and peace of mind:· Your online catalog is up to date as well as the prices and stocks displayed· Closed products in Cegid are automatically deactivated on your site· You reduce the risk of inconsistency between your Cegid database and your PrestaShop database· You save time by no longer re-entering data· Your PrestaShop orders are automatically integrated into Cegid, you optimize the processing times of your orders.· Secure synchronizations: security token, HTTPS protocol support· GDPR compliant: the module doesn’t store your data! It only acts as a gateway between your website and your Cegid platform· Clear and simple: manage your data from Cegid and flesh them out in PrestaShop. No third interface needed

module.description: The best way to get your customers' attention for a special offer, new items or categories, or any type of announcement you would like to share is by using a message bar

module.additional_description: Making sure your site visitors know about all of your latest offers can be challenging. How do you make sure they know about your awesome Black Friday deal? Or new items you're selling? With Message Bar, you can share any updates you like with your customers in a non-intrusive yet eye-catching way. Message Bar is the quickest way to show any announcement to your audience and keep them informed. Here are just a few ways you can use Message Bar to increase sales, retention, and engagement. You can also be as creative as you like. Show any type of message bar announcement that will help you reach your website business’ goals. Message Bar works both on desktop and mobile devices.

module.name: wkvirtualtryonsaas
module.description: Virtual Try-On allows customers to virtually try the products in a realistic way from the comfort of their homes
module.author: Webkul
module.description_full: Virtual Try-On allows customers to virtually try the products in a realistic way from the comfort of their homes. Customers can upload image from system, capture it from camera, or use 3D try-on feature to visualize how the items will look on them.
module.additional_description: Despite the growing popularity of online shopping, brick-and-mortal have retained their main advantage i.e. customers being able to try out product before buying them. PrestaShop Virtual Try-On is a great tool that lets customers visualize the eyewear products without putting them on physically. Effectively showcase your products by providing customers a better understanding of exactly how the product might work for them. The extension facilitates the customers to try the eyewear items virtually by: Image upload: Customers can upload the image from their system and see how the particular frame look on them. Image Capture: Customers can capture the image using the camera of the device and visualize what the look like on their face. 3D Try-On: The feature captures customer’s face from various angles and analyze it thoroughly. All visitor need to do is enable camera access and they can view how the product will look on them. Boost Conversions With virtual try-on, customers get a much better understanding of the product than just scrolling through the images on the product page. Providing an accurate and personalize representation of product will help customer make faster and informed decisions. Reduce Returns Customers get to visualize how the item will look on them before deciding to purchase. This will reduce the chances of returns as they get what they wanted.

module.name: shootime
module.description: Shootime is a revolutionary virtual photo and video studio designed exclusively for ecommerce brands
module.author: PrestaShop Partners

module.additional_description: This module will share you PrestaShop details with Shootime, and let you purchase on Shootime using your PrestaShop billing. Accessibility: Affordable pricing allows merchants to access professional studio services without breaking the budget. Convenient Online Management: The entire process, from booking to production, can be efficiently managed online, providing a convenient workflow for merchants. Real-time Visibility: Merchants can follow live photo and video shoots, ensuring transparency and the ability to provide input in real-time. Cost-Effective Solution: Compared to traditional studios, Shootime offers cost-effective pricing, making high-quality visual content creation accessible for ecommerce brands. Time-Saving Efficiency: By handling all aspects of production, Shootime frees up time for merchants to focus on core business activities. Comprehensive Service Package: Shootime takes care of everything, from studio setup to booking models and set designers, providing a hassle-free experience for merchants. Modern Adaptability: Designed for the modern world, Shootime adapts to the evolving needs of ecommerce, offering an agile and innovative solution. Enhanced Collaboration: Real-time updates and communication enhance collaboration between Shootime and merchants, ensuring the final results meet expectations.

module.name: smartargettelegram
module.description: If you want to offer customer support using Telegram, this is the right addon for you to use on your website. Show a Telegram button on all your pages so customers can contact you easily
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: If you want to offer customer support using Telegram, this is the right addon for you to use on your website. Show a Telegram button on all your pages so customers can contact you easily.
module.additional_description: Turn website visitors into your next customers Let's make it easier for your customers to contact you with Telegram Contact Us. Most of your prospective customers are already using Telegram. It's time to give them the option to contact you in a way that feels familiar, trustworthy, and fun. Get back to your customers faster in a way they enjoy When someone has a question about your business, chances are they’re just going to leave your site altogether rather than searching for a support email. With so many options out there, people are too busy to spend time looking for answers. But when you give them the option to easily contact you via Telegram right from your website, this feels like a quicker, more familiar way to get in touch. You can get back to them just a few hours later and they will get your reply directly to their mobile device. No more replies getting lost in an inbox with (probably) hundreds of emails. Customers must have Telegram account in order to contact you.

module.author: PrestaShop Partners

Personalisation is the best way to increase your conversion rate, limit bounce rate and cart abandonment. By personalizing your offer in real time, you can offer each visitor an individual and unique experience! BEYABLE modules are no-code and easy to learn.Easy integration*10 ROI for our customers+30% more visits to the product page+20% basket placement+10% average basket

module.name: smartargetcontactform
module.description: Make it easy for customers to contact you for any questions by using Contact Form. Reduce the chance of losing customers by being more available
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Make it easy for customers to contact you for any questions by using Contact Form. Reduce the chance of losing customers by being more available.
module.additional_description: In less than 5 minutes you can add a contact form feature to your website and allow customers to contact your support. Using Contact Form will allow you to get customers' questions directly to your email, easily and fast. You don’t need to develop your own contact form or to hide it in an internal contact us page. With Contact Form by Smartarget, you can add an icon on all pages that allows customers to fill in a form, and for you to get it right away. Choose what fields the customers should fill in the form, so you have all the needed information in order to give them the best customer support. Contact Form by Smartarget is the most efficient way to get customers contacting you by using a form. You don’t need any development skills to use it. The app works both on desktop and mobile devices.

module.name: smartargetstories

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartarget Stories will make your website look much better and advanced by showing stories like in Instagram and TikTok. Use the Stories to promote items, discounts, etc.
module.additional_description: Having stories on a website can help engage visitors and build a connection with the brand. They humanize the company and can communicate brand values, history and mission in a relatable and memorable way. Additionally, stories can increase time spent on the website. Smartarget Stories bring gamifications and make the customers interact with your website, not just reading your content or product descriptions. Getting the customer to interact with your website, simply makes them much more engaged and increases the chance to convert them to be a paid customer. Also, customers are used to stories which can help you to get their full attention to specific content you would like to share. Smartarget Stories allow you to create multiple stories for your website and include images or videos with music/sound, just like you can do on Instagram, TikTok and other social media platforms. You can add a button with a call to action to generate traffic to specific pages on your website.

module.name: smartargetexitpopup
module.description: Prevent customers from leaving your website by showing an Exit Popup with a special offer or any notification you would like to show and increase the chance to make a sale
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Prevent customers from leaving your website by showing an Exit Popup with a special offer or any notification you would like to show and increase the chance to make a sale.
module.additional_description: You spend a lot of time and money to bring customers to your website, with Exit Popup you can keep users on the website for longer and increase the chance that they will become a paid customer. Exit Popup recognizes when a customer is about to close the tab on their browser, when the mouse cursor is moving to the top area of the screen. This may mean that your potential customers didn’t find what they want. That doesn't have to be the case when you have a chance to show a popup message with a special discount or valuable information that might cause them to stay on your website. You don’t need to have any coding skills or help from developers to configure your popup and show it on your website. It takes only a few minutes to create the popup of your dreams. Exit Popup works on desktop devices only because it recognizes the mouse cursor movements which don't exist in mobile devices. If you want Popup for mobile too, check this addon: https://addons.prestashop.com/en/pop-up/91479-popup-smartarget.html
